testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by leading businesses across Egypt for their vending machine solutions

ahmed.name: Ahmed Hassan
ahmed.content: Inovara's vending machines have transformed our office environment. The smart technology and cashless payments have increased employee satisfaction by 40%.

fatima.name: Dr. Fatima Al-Zahra
fatima.content: The 24/7 availability of healthy snacks and beverages has been a game-changer for our staff and visitors. The real-time monitoring helps us maintain optimal inventory levels.

mohamed.name: Mohamed El-Sayed
mohamed.content: Our factory workers love the convenience of having fresh snacks available during their shifts. The ROI has exceeded our expectations within the first 6 months.

sarah.name: Sarah Mahmoud
sarah.content: The smart vending solutions have significantly improved our campus services. Students appreciate the modern payment options and variety of healthy choices.

omar.name: Omar Farouk
omar.content: Our guests are impressed with the premium vending experience. The elegant design and smart features complement our luxury hotel environment perfectly.

caseStudies.title: Success Stories
caseStudies.subtitle: Real results from real businesses across Egypt

cairo.title: Cairo Business District Transformation
cairo.challenge: Low employee satisfaction due to limited food options and outdated vending machines.
cairo.solution: Deployed 15 smart vending machines with healthy options, cashless payments, and real-time inventory management.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Facility Modernization
healthcare.challenge: Need for 24/7 food service for medical staff and visitors with strict hygiene requirements.
healthcare.solution: Installed 8 premium vending machines with temperature-controlled compartments and contactless payment options.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing Plant Efficiency
manufacturing.challenge: Worker productivity issues due to limited access to refreshments during long shifts.
manufacturing.solution: Strategic placement of 12 vending machines across production floors with shift-specific product offerings.

caseStudies.cta: Ready to Create Your Success Story?
caseStudies.ctaText: Join hundreds of businesses across Egypt who have transformed their operations with our smart vending solutions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Inovara collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and services. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

service.title: Service Delivery
service.description: To provide and maintain our vending machine services

improvement.title: Service Improvement
improvement.description: To analyze usage patterns and improve our services

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted during transmission and storage

access.title: Access Control
access.description: Limited access to authorized personnel only

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.erasure: Right to request deletion of your data

introduction.title: What Are Cookies
introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how Inovara uses cookies and similar technologies on our website to provide you with the best possible experience.

definition.title: Cookie Definition
definition.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us provide and improve our services.

firstParty.title: First-Party Cookies
firstParty.description: Set directly by our website for functionality and analytics

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: Set by external services we use for analytics and marketing

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for website functionality and security
essential.examples: Session management, Security features, Basic functionality

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: Help us understand how visitors use our website
performance.examples: Page views, User behavior, Site performance

analytics.title: Analytics and Performance
analytics.content: We use cookies to analyze website traffic and improve performance:

security.title: Security and Authentication
security.content: Cookies help us maintain security and user authentication:

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings:

consent.title: Consent Management
consent.content: We provide tools to manage your cookie preferences:

thirdParty.intro: We use third-party services that may set cookies:

cta.description: Take control of your privacy by managing your cookie preferences and learning more about our data practices.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer

introduction.title: General Disclaimer
introduction.content: The information on this website is provided on an 'as is' basis. While we strive for accuracy, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information.

nature.title: Nature of Information
nature.content: All information on this website is for general informational purposes only and should not be considered as professional advice.

accuracy.title: Information Accuracy
accuracy.content: We strive to keep information accurate but cannot guarantee complete accuracy at all times.

completeness.title: Information Completeness
completeness.content: Information may not be complete and should not be relied upon as the sole source of information.

specifications.title: Product Specifications
specifications.content: Product specifications and features are subject to change without notice.

performance.title: Performance Claims
performance.content: Any performance claims or results are based on typical usage scenarios and may vary.
performance.results: Results may vary based on conditions

damages.title: Direct Damages
damages.description: Our liability for direct damages is limited as specified in our terms

indirect.title: Indirect Damages
indirect.description: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages

consequential.title: Consequential Loss
consequential.description: Loss of profits or business interruption is not covered

limitation.title: Liability Cap
limitation.description: Total liability is capped at the amount paid for services

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Content

nature.title: Nature of Content

investment.title: Investment Advice
investment.content: Nothing on this website constitutes investment advice

business.title: Business Advice
business.content: Business decisions should be made with professional consultation

changes.title: Policy Changes

changes.effectiveness: Changes become effective immediately upon posting
changes.responsibility: Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes

reply.products: We offer smart, premium, enterprise, and custom machines. Which are you interested in?
reply.support: Our team is here 24/7. You can describe your issue or use the contact form.
reply.contact: You can reach us via the contact section. Would you like me to guide you there?

showcase.title: Smart Vending Solutions
showcase.subtitle: Professional-grade vending machines designed to drive business growth, enhance operational efficiency, and deliver exceptional returns on investment.

flower.title: Premium Flower Vending
flower.description: Elevate your business environment with fresh, premium flowers available 24/7. Perfect for corporate offices, hotels, and luxury venues seeking to enhance their ambiance and customer experience.

snack.title: Smart Snack Solutions
snack.description: Boost employee satisfaction and productivity with intelligent snack vending. Features real-time inventory management, healthy options, and seamless cashless payments for modern workplaces.

pizza.title: Automated Food Service
pizza.description: Revolutionize food service with our automated pizza vending machines. Delivers fresh, hot meals in minutes, perfect for busy offices, manufacturing facilities, and 24/7 operations.

beverage.title: Intelligent Beverage Systems
beverage.description: Optimize beverage service with smart dispensing technology. Multiple temperature zones, real-time consumption analytics, and premium drink options for maximum customer satisfaction.

cta.title: Ready to Scale Your Business?
cta.description: Partner with us to transform your operations with enterprise-grade vending solutions. Get a personalized consultation and discover how our technology can drive your business forward.

chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: How can I help you today?
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. I can help you with information about our smart vending machines, pricing, and services. What would you like to know?

responses.greeting: Hello! I'm here to help you with information about our smart vending machine solutions. What would you like to know?
responses.pricing: Our pricing varies based on the type and quantity of vending machines you need. For detailed pricing information, I recommend requesting a personalized quote through our quote form. Would you like me to help you with that?
responses.pricingPersonalized: I understand you're looking for options within your budget. Our pricing is flexible and depends on your specific needs. Let me help you get a personalized quote that fits your requirements.
responses.products: We offer a comprehensive range of smart vending machines including snack machines, beverage dispensers, food vending machines, and custom solutions. Each machine features cashless payments, real-time analytics, and remote management capabilities.
responses.contact: You can reach us through multiple channels: WhatsApp for quick support, email for detailed inquiries, or by filling out our contact form. Our team is available to assist you with any questions about our smart vending solutions.
responses.quote: I'd be happy to help you get a quote! You can request a personalized quote by clicking the 'Get Quote' button in our floating menu, or I can guide you through our contact form. What type of vending machines are you interested in?
responses.features: Our smart vending machines come with advanced features including cashless payments, real-time analytics, remote management, and customizable branding. Each machine is designed for maximum efficiency and user experience.
responses.industries: Our smart vending solutions are perfect for various industries including offices, hospitals, schools, retail stores, and more. Each solution is tailored to meet specific industry requirements.
responses.default: I understand you're interested in our smart vending machine solutions. For more specific information, I recommend speaking with our sales team. You can contact us via WhatsApp or request a quote for personalized assistance.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a trusted partner for enterprise vending solutions, committed to delivering smart technology that drives business success. Our expertise in intelligent automation helps organizations optimize operations, enhance customer experiences, and achieve sustainable growth through innovative vending solutions.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do and shape our commitment to excellence

enterprise.title: Enterprise Focus
enterprise.description: Built for business success and operational excellence

partnership.title: True Partnership
partnership.description: Dedicated support and collaborative approach to your success

solutions.title: Smart Solutions
solutions.description: Intelligent technology that adapts to your business needs

trust.title: Trusted Expertise
trust.description: Proven track record in vending technology and business automation

cta.title: Partner with Industry Leaders
cta.description: Join forward-thinking businesses that trust Inovara for their vending technology needs. Experience the difference that true partnership makes.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded with a vision to revolutionize the vending industry, Inovara emerged from a simple yet powerful idea: what if vending machines could be intelligent, connected, and truly beneficial for businesses?
story.content2: We started as a small team of passionate engineers and business experts who saw the potential for smart technology to transform traditional vending into a powerful business tool. Today, we're proud to serve hundreds of businesses across various industries.
story.content3: Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, customer-centric development, and a commitment to delivering solutions that not only meet but exceed expectations. Every machine we deploy is a step toward a more connected, efficient, and profitable future for our clients.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Numbers that reflect our commitment to excellence and client success

uptime.label: Uptime Guarantee
uptime.description: Reliable performance you can count on

features.title: Why Choose Inovara
features.subtitle: Discover what sets us apart in the vending industry

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Bank-grade security with advanced encryption and monitoring systems to protect your business data and operations.

customer.title: Customer-Centric
customer.description: We prioritize customer satisfaction with personalized support, quick response times, and tailored solutions.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: Cutting-edge technology and continuous innovation drive our solutions, keeping you ahead of the competition.

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: Track record of successful implementations with measurable business outcomes and satisfied clients.
